title: SAML Proxy - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: Netskope enables you to integrate with your existing proxy implementation to direct your traffic to the Netskope Cloud using these proxy integrations. Reverse Proxy Reverse Proxy as a Service Universal Reverse Proxy Forward Proxy with ADFS Configure Blue Coat for Proxy Chaining Configure Forcepoint for Proxy Chaining Netskope Explicit Proxy for Chromebooks with Google SAML Forward Proxy
